categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A duel occurred on the planet Centares in 0 ABY between the Sith Lord Darth Vader and the bounty hunter Beilert Valance, as Vader was seeking the Rebel deserter Tyler Lucian in their effort to discover the name of the pilot who destroyed the Death Star, and Valance was attempting to prevent Vader from finding him. The duel ended when Valance was thrown into Centares' corrosive lakes, and Lucian committed suicide rather than be captured.
